alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 06 at 5:56PM CST until January 07 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...In Wisconsin, Burnett, Washburn, Douglas and Bayfield Counties. In Minnesota, Pine County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Red Cliff Band and the Mille Lacs Band, Lena Lake and, Hinckley areas. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
